events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle collided with mine at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage your auto accident claim and will be your point of contact.
We confirm receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and appreciate your prompt notification.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the damage, and a repair estimate to proceed with the claim.
All required documents, including the police report and photos of the accident, have been submitted as requested.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence to assess the circumstances of the car accident.
The investigation into the vehicle collision has been completed, and liability has been established in your favor.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on the damage assessment report and your coverage terms.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and timely updates throughout the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved, and we are proceeding with the payment disbursement.
The payment for your claim has been issued and should arrive in your bank account within three business days.
Your claim case is now closed following successful settlement and payment issuance; thank you for your cooperation.
